post:
For the first time StrongHUB is offering you special discount on KVM VPS located in TMS datacenter in Dallas. Our KVM node is powered by Intel Xeon E3-1240 3.3GHz, 4x1TB WD Raid Edition Enterprise SATA, 3ware Hardware RAID10 connected to 100mbps port.

**PKV-01**
1 CPU Core
256MB RAM
20GB Disk Space
500GB Bandwidth
100Mbps Port
1 IPv4
Unmanaged
**$3.48 Per Month** (Coupon code: **PKV01LEB50**)
[**Order Here**](https://client.stronghub.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=22)

**PKV-02**
2 CPU Cores
512MB RAM
40GB Disk Space
1000GB Bandwidth
100Mbps Port
1 IPv4
Unmanaged
**$6.98 Per Month** (Coupon code: **PKV02LEB50**)
[**Order Here**](https://client.stronghub.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=23)

At this moment we have many popular O/S templates for your KVM VPS. If you want customize your own partition and installation or your O/S is not listed just let us know, we can upload the ISOs.

Acceptable Use (Please read our TOS for further info)
* NO SPAM allowed.
* NO IRC allowed.
* NO warez allowed.
* Legal adult content is allowed.
* Copyright and DMCA must be strictly followed.

All orders will be automatically verified by MaxMind. Please open support ticket if you order is flagged as fraud.
